MASK.HINT: An image to use as a mask for shaping the minimap.
MASK.NAME: Image Mask

OVERLAY.HINT: An image to overlay atop the minimap.
OVERLAY.NAME: MiniMap Overlay

PADDING.HINT: Space, in pixels, from the edge of the canvas area.
PADDING.NAME: Padding

POSITION.HINT: Relative screen position of the minimap.
POSITION.NAME: MiniMap Position

SHOW.HINT: If enabled, will show the minimap.
SHOW.NAME: Show MiniMap

BGCOLOR.NAME: Background Color
BGCOLOR.HINT: The background color to use on the minimap
